UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Isolation of a variant of subtilosin A with hemolytic activity.
Literature.Author: Huang T, Geng H, Miyyapuram VR, Sit CS, Vederas JC, Nakano MM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis JH642(MIC=100µM),Bacillus anthracis Sterne 7702(MIC=2.56µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10987(MIC=6.4µM),Bacillus thuringiensis NRRL -B4039(MIC=6.4µM),Enterococcus faecalis V583(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus carnosus pCX15(MIC=16µM),Listeria monocytogenes F4244(MIC=6.4µM),Streptococcus pyogenes MGAS 5005(MIC=6.4µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(no activity data),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus RN6390(no activity data)
